domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

text:
@SABCNews Why haven't anyone talked about it. Just posting a poster about 5G won't convince the people that 5G is save.

Please get experts on board like:

1)5G expert
2) Health expert
3) law expert on technologies that causes health risks.

Just poor journalism.
